item.description:
Anyone in the mood for a goofy comedy?

I Love You, Man (Rated R)

As his wedding day approaches, Peter Klaven (Paul Rudd) realizes he has no one to act as his best man. Through a series of ''man-dates,'' he finds Sydney Fife (Jason Segel), and the pair become instant friends. But as Peter's ''bro-mance'' with Sydney grows stronger, it threatens his relationship with his fiancee (Rashida Jones), forcing Peter to make a choice.

A few early reviews I saw say this is a funny one.

Note: This is opening weekend for the movie so I'd like to get seated early. The movie time is 7:05 so please be there no later than 6:45. If you arrive late and want to meet in the theater, call me at 203-812-0705.

Dinner or drinks afterward? Let me know if you're interested.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby. Movie time is 7:05. Please be there no later than 6:45.
item.name: I Love You, Man
